p: The prepared EPL-NE loaded liquisolids were evaluated for weight variation, content uniformity [ 2], hardness (TBH 325, Erweka, Heusenstamm, Germany), friability (TAR, Erweka, Heusenstamm, Germany), and disintegration time (DST-3/6 automated disintegration tester, Logan, UT, USA) according to standardized United States Pharmacopeia (USP) conditions [ 32].
